sentences: Ta esitas ametliku asjus töölt lahkumiseks.
Vajadust mööda võite esitada taotlusi erinevates asjades.
context: The word 'asjus' is an Estonian noun in the genitive case, derived from 'avaldus' (application/statement). It appears to mean 'in matters of' or 'regarding', often used when referring to specific issues, cases, or applications. In compound forms with '-|avaldus' structures, it creates words meaning various types of expressions or declarations about different subjects.
